snippet: Nascar chairman Brian France said that no disciplinary action would be taken against the driver Kurt Busch while the police in Delaware investigate a claim of domestic assault made by his former girlfriend, Patricia Driscoll.
abstract: Nascar chairman Brian France announces that no disciplinary action will be taken against driver Kurt Busch while Delaware police investigate claim of domestic assault made by his former girlfriend Patricia Driscoll.
lead_paragraph: Nascar chairman Brian France said that no disciplinary action would be taken against the driver Kurt Busch while the police in Delaware investigate a claim of domestic assault made by his former girlfriend, Patricia Driscoll.
